data.name: Nemesis
data.description: The heir to Apocalypse from a world where mutants dominate humans, Nemesis drains the life force of his enemies, transferring their health to his Death Seed allies.

starItems.name: Nemesis
starItems.description: The heir to Apocalypse from a world where mutants dominate humans, Nemesis drains the life force of his enemies, transferring their health to his Death Seed allies.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies

6.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade: Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
Transfer all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, from a random non-summoned Archangel ally to self
Spread all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, on self to all non-summoned <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all positive effects from a random non-summoned Archangel ally to self.
Spread all positive effects on self to all non-summoned <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
These actions will not spread <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, or <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all positive effects from a random non-summoned Archangel ally to self.
Spread all positive effects on self to all non-summoned <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
These actions will not spread <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, or <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
Steal +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all positive effects from a random non-summoned Archangel ally to self.
Spread all positive effects on self to all non-summoned <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
These actions will not spread <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, or <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies.
1.nextUpgrade: Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies.
3.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies.
5.nextUpgrade:
Steal +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from each target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from each target and redistribute to self and all allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, when this character or a <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
 > When this character or a <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: Fill this character's Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
 > When this character or a <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>30%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Lower Armor by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
Lower Armor by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
 > When this character or a <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>30%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
Lower Armor by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for all enemies with <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
 > When this character or a <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>30%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
